tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: Very specific grading. You have to follow the lab format to a T. No shortcuts for this class. I had him for orgo lab 1 & 2. One good thing about him is that he explains the entire lab procedure at the beginning of class. Honestly, he\'s not easy, but his grading is very clear. Just be aware this class will eat up 3-4 hours to write the prelab.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I have never learned less in any class in College. He is seldom available to help in lab bc he is too busy eating or grading reports. He says that he wants you to learn on your own how to do the exp so he won\'t help you and then has the nerve to be strict on grading yields (he watches you weigh it). I learned zero and still got an A. He\'s a joke.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I dropped his lab right away as soon as I walked out of the first lab. He checks the notebook and even if you do a good job he has some negative comment about it. He has to watch you weighing your product and then he reweighs the product after you leave. He is too big of a headache for one credit.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: More work than other lab professors. Do the lab reports, lab notebook as he tells you and you\'ll be fine. Study the lab textbook every week to prepare for pop quizes. I got an A, so its manageable. Nice guy who appreciates someone who offers to help him.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Prof. Katten is very a fair lab instructor. He doesn\'t give freebies but he really knows whats going on and is very helpful. So long as you show up and keep your notebook in order you\'ll do well.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This guy\'s deal is interesting. This was his first semester teaching so he had no idea what he was doing. Because he had no idea though, he was very lenient. I can\'t say he\'d be this lenient for other semesters. If not, then, because of his lack of comprehension and because of his disorganization, it would be very tough to do well in his class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Goodness, where do i start? He gives his heart out to teaching, he sometimes has trouble himself but such an amazing sweet guy. I loved every second in his class, hes lenient and is pretty chilled out. Thank you so much Professor Katten LOVED YOUR CLASS !!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: he is really horrible...it was the first time ever that I dropped a class!! He is a disaster and does\'t know anything about the labs. He makes you come prepared but never knows anything and always has to ask another professor for help.AVOID HIM IF YOU CAN!!!!!
